items.name: Hello Sake (Junmai ginjo)
items.description: Our own house label brewed and bottled in Japan by Dewazakura Browery. Fragrant and dry, specifically curated to complement our hand rolls

items.name: Nakano "Saika" (daiginjo)
items.description: Superb complexity, opulent body

items.name: Yoshi No Gawa(honjozo)
items.description: Deceptively complex sets a high standard in the honjozo category

items.name: Rose Umeshu-(sweet wine)
items.description: Beautiful aromas of rose and Japanese plum with delightful sweetness and refreshing acidity

items.name: Konnichiwagarita
items.description: Hello Sake, midori, Japanese liqueur yuzukosho, yuzu juice

items.name: Kaiju En Neguroni
items.description: Roku Gin, strawberry averna, plum umeshu, plum bitters, dehydrated dragon fruit

items.name: Rokabiru baby
items.description: Suntory Toki, galliano, sakura soda, vanilla foam

items.name: Sakura blossom
items.description: Peach juice based Japanese sweetness with sangria

items.name: Lychee berry chuhi
items.description: Lychee juice & straw berry sweet and sour

items.name: Roku Gin
items.description: An aromatic expression of six(roku) Japanese botanicals

items.name: Toki Japanese Whisky
items.description: Setting a standard in Japanese whisky. Lively nose with a smooth, vanilla finish

items.name: Hibiki Harmony Whisky
items.description: Premium, balanced blend of Japanese whiskies, hints of honey and orange zest

items.name: Hello Lager (tap beer)
items.description: Locally brewed, unfiltered rice lager produced by Rorshach Brewing Co

items.name: Sparkling Water (Perier)
items.description: Refreshing carbonated water to cleanse your palate.

items.name: Coca Cola (Reg, Diet)
items.description: Classic Coca-Cola served chilled in a glass bottle.

items.name: White Peach Juice
items.description: Delicate and aromatic white peach soda imported from Japan.

items.name: Asahi 0.0% Beer
items.description: House brewed Japanese traditional matcha with unlimitied refiled

items.name: Green Tea
items.description: House brewed Japanese traditional matcha with unlimitied refiled

items.name: Genmai Tea (Brown rice tea)
items.description: House brewed Japanese traditional matcha with unlimitied refiled

items.name: Ebi Oshi (Shrimp Oshi)
items.description: Flame-seared shrimp sushi with a rich house sauce.

items.description: Seared salmon layered over rice with our signature miso glaze.
